text: pratiksepa kala aya, tamange hrdayanhi (obava sahamulinma vinasa kara dæmiya yutu yayi) moda pali gænime cetanava sthirava taba gat avasthava gæna sita balanu. e avasthavedi allah tamange dutaya kerehida, visvasaya tæbuvan kerehida, tamange dayava (vana manasata sæhælluvada, sthirabhavayada) pahala kara, suddha vu vadana kerehida sthira kara hæriyeya. ovun eyata itamat sudussan bavatada, eya atkara gata yutu aya bavatada sitiyaha. allah siyalla hondin danneku vasayen sitinneya
